aboutMyCurrentRole.description: I have a Computer Science Degree and MBA.
aboutMyCurrentRole.specialties:
- Intersection of Media & Technology
- Developing new startups
aboutMyCurrentRole.strengthAreas:
- Web 2.0 and Web Services
- Real Time Internet: Blogs, Podcasting

workDetails.title: Wipro
workDetails.description: Started as a Senior Front End Developer responsible for optimizing the Wipro main site and moved to backend where I worked with databased  as large as 100K records.

Volunteer as Mentor.description: I believe that every day is a learning process. Life is a marathon that needs a lot of perseverence. That's why I am always eager to learn more.

list.name: Nikita Stone
list.description: David has built a series of interesting tech media businesses. He's a great mentor - he does his homework and asks good questions to see if you understood what he explained.

list.name: Tom Hanks
list.description: He has strong business development and deep technological know-how. Whether its Web 2.0, wireless or larger system's architecture, David easily walks the talk.

list.name: Jessie Smith
list.description: I met David at an ICANN meeting in Melbourne, Australia 2 years ago and I have a great deal of respect for his personal passion. It was great being able to have him as my mentor.
